title: Blue Owl BDC Allows 17% Redemptions as Investors Storm Exit
description: Blue Owl Capital Inc. is dramatically increasing the amount of money investors can pull from one of its private credit funds after being hit with a deluge of redemption requests last month.
content: Blue Owl Capital Inc. is dramatically increasing the amount of money investors can pull from one of its private credit funds after being hit with a deluge of redemption requests last month.
